title: NBA Finals, DeMarcus Cousins, Kawhi Leonard, & where Colin was right and wrong
itunes:title: NBA Finals, DeMarcus Cousins, Kawhi Leonard, & where Colin was right and wrong
description:
Colin discusses game 2 of the NBA Finals, why it was great for Golden State Warriors C DeMarcus Cousins, why the Toronto Raptors will have a hard time keeping F Kawhi Leonard, and where he was right and wrong over the weekend. Guests include Chris Broussard, Jim Jackson, and Ric Bucher. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
